html: Recompenses. When the persecutors of Sion, that is, of the Church, shall receive their reward. (Challoner) — The Idumeans had frequently shown their ill-will towards the Jews, 2 Paralipomenon xxviii. 17., and Amos i. 11. (Calmet) — Sion shall perish as the wicked in hell shall be tormented. (Worthington)
